entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kleefeld 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
